item.title: 交叉编译 zlib-1.2.12
item.description: 交叉编译 zlib-1.2.12 export PATH="<path-to-gcc-linaro-5.3-2016.02-x86_64_arm-linux-gnueabihf>/bin":$PATH export CROSS_COMPILE=arm-linux-gnueabihf export HOST=arm-linux-gnueabihf mkdir build_out ./configure --prefix=/code/zlib-1.2.12/build_out make make install
